name: SKELETON GOES TO WALMART THE UNPARALLELED CINEMATIC EXPERIENCE
name_original: SKELETON GOES TO WALMART THE UNPARALLELED CINEMATIC EXPERIENCE
description:
THIS IS THE GAME OF ALL TIME - an anonymous reviewer, who may or may not exist

experience 5 seconds of a regular trip to Walmart, except you are a skeleton. and it's cinematic.

who made this? WHY? - another reviewer, concerned with the production of this entertainment medium

by @bloatedloaf for PARADISE BLITZ 2
